name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, egg, milk, and sugar. Cook on a hot skillet with butter until golden.

name: Apple Pie
instructions: Mix sliced apples with sugar and cinnamon. Place in crust made from flour and butter, bake until golden.

name: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Whisk eggs with salt and pepper. Cook on a skillet with butter until soft and scrambled.

name: Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs with milk, salt, and pepper. Pour onto a hot skillet, add cheese, and cook until firm.

name: Garlic Butter Salmon
instructions: Season the salmon with salt. Melt butter in a skillet and sauté garlic until fragrant. Place salmon in the skillet and cook until golden and cooked through.

name: Cheesy Broccoli Omelette
instructions: Steam broccoli until tender. In a bowl, whisk eggs with salt. Melt butter in a skillet, pour in eggs, and sprinkle broccoli and cheese. Cook until eggs are set.

name: Miso Soup with Dumplings
instructions: In a pot, bring water to a boil. Add miso, garlic, vegetables, soy sauce, and salt. Add dumplings and cook until they float to the top. Serve hot.

name: Oatmeal with Jam
instructions: Cook oats in water or milk until thick. Top with jam and enjoy warm.

name: Cheesy Mushroom Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions. In a skillet, sauté mushrooms and garlic in butter. Toss pasta with mushrooms and cheese. Season with salt.

name: Chicken and Broccoli Stir-fry
instructions: Cut chicken into pieces. Stir-fry garlic and chicken in a skillet until chicken is cooked through. Add broccoli and soy sauce, cook until broccoli is tender.

name: Egg and Cheese Tortilla
instructions: Whisk egg with salt. Melt butter in a skillet and pour egg mixture. Add cheese and cook until egg is set. Place on a tortilla and roll.

name: Sausage and Mushroom Skillet
instructions: Sauté sausage in a skillet until browned. Add butter, garlic, and mushrooms. Cook until mushrooms are tender. Season with salt to taste.

name: Broccoli Cheese Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions. Steam broccoli until tender. Toss pasta with broccoli, cheese, and salt.

name: Vegetable Stir-fry with Soy Sauce
instructions: Heat oil in a skillet, add garlic, and cook until fragrant. Add vegetables, soy sauce, and salt. Stir-fry until vegetables are tender.

name: Indomie Stir-Fry with Vegetables
instructions: Cook indomie according to package instructions. In a skillet, stir-fry garlic and vegetables with soy sauce and salt. Add cooked indomie and toss well.

name: Sausage and Mushroom Indomie
instructions: Cook indomie and set aside. In a skillet, cook sausage and mushroom in butter with garlic until browned. Add indomie and toss together.

name: Cheesy Indomie
instructions: Cook indomie and drain. Melt butter in a pan, add indomie, and mix with cheese until melted. Season with salt.

name: Apple Cinnamon Pancakes
instructions: Grate the apple and mix with egg, melted butter, sugar, and a pinch of salt. Cook spoonfuls of batter on a hot skillet until golden on both sides.

name: Salmon Miso Soup
instructions: Bring the miso soup to a boil, add soy sauce, and simmer with broccoli and salmon pieces until cooked. Season with pepper and serve hot.

name: Cheesy Broccoli Tortilla Wrap
instructions: Steam the broccoli until tender, then layer it with cheese in a tortilla. Heat butter in a skillet and grill the wrap until golden and cheese is melted.

name: Chicken and Broccoli Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta until al dente. Sauté chicken pieces with salt and pepper, then add steamed broccoli and pasta. Toss together and season as needed.

name: Taco-Seasoned Nacho Cheese Tortilla Wrap
instructions: Spread nacho cheese on the tortilla, sprinkle taco seasoning, then roll up. Grill lightly in a skillet until warmed and slightly crisp.

name: Miso Dumpling Soup
instructions: Prepare miso soup and add dumplings. Season with soy sauce and pepper. Cook until dumplings are tender and serve hot.

name: Chili Garlic Broccoli Stir-fry
instructions: Stir-fry garlic and broccoli, then add chili sauce, soy sauce, and pepper for a spicy vegetable side dish.

name: Cheesy Chicken and Broccoli Nachos
instructions: Bake chicken and steamed broccoli on a sheet, season with taco seasoning, and top with melted nacho cheese for cheesy, spicy nachos.

name: Almond Milk and Oat Porridge
instructions: Cook oats in almond milk, add sugar to taste, and serve warm for a creamy porridge.

name: Egg and Cheese Breakfast Burrito
instructions: Whisk the egg with salt and pepper, cook in a skillet. Place on a tortilla with cheese and roll into a burrito.

name: Spicy Sausage Nachos
instructions: Slice sausage, spread nacho cheese on tortillas, add sausage slices and drizzle chili sauce. Bake until cheese melts.

name: Broccoli and Cheese Soup
instructions: Steam broccoli, then blend with cheese, butter, salt, and pepper for a creamy soup.
